definition: To impart knowledge or skills to someone through teaching or instruction, typically used when referring to teaching someone a particular subject or skill.

examples.german: Ich bringe meinem Kind das Schwimmen bei.
examples.english: I teach my child how to swim.

examples.german: Sie bringt mir bei, wie man Gitarre spielt.
examples.english: She teaches me how to play the guitar.

examples.german: Der Lehrer bringt den Schülern Mathematik bei.
examples.english: The teacher teaches the students mathematics.

examples.german: Kannst du mir das Kochen beibringen?
examples.english: Can you teach me how to cook?

examples.german: Er hat mir viele nützliche Dinge beigebracht.
examples.english: He taught me many useful things.
